mapper.sql: super_article_sort_id, super_artilce_name, account_id, creat_time, to_update, bei_yong_yi, bei_yong_er, bei_yong_san
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_super_article_sort
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_super_article_sort
super_article_sort_id,
super_artilce_name,
account_id,
creat_time,
to_update,
bei_yong_yi,
bei_yong_er,
bei_yong_san,
#{superArticleSortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{superArtilceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{toUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{beiYongYi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beiYongEr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beiYongSan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `tb_super_article_sort` WHERE tb_super_article_sort.bei_yong_yi = #{statOne} OR tb_super_article_sort.bei_yong_yi = #{stateTwo};

SELECT super_article_sort_id, super_artilce_name, bei_yong_er, bei_yong_san FROM tb_super_article_sort WHERE tb_super_article_sort.account_id IN ( SELECT tb_role_account_key.account_id FROM tb_role_account_key WHERE tb_role_account_key.role_id = ( SELECT tb_roles.role_id FROM tb_roles WHERE tb_roles.roles_name = "super" ) ) GROUP BY super_artilce_name, super_article_sort_id, bei_yong_er, bei_yong_san ORDER BY LENGTH(bei_yong_er) ASC

SELECT super_article_sort_id, super_artilce_name FROM tb_super_article_sort WHERE tb_super_article_sort.account_id = #{id} GROUP BY super_artilce_name, super_article_sort_id ORDER BY LENGTH(bei_yong_er) ASC

SELECT tb_article.article_id, tb_article.article_name, tb_article.brief_introduction, tb_article.creat_time, tb_article.bei_yong_yi, tb_article.bei_yong_er, tb_article.bei_yong_si, tb_article.bei_yong_wu, (select tb_account.user_name from tb_account where tb_account.id=#{id}) as author FROM `tb_article` WHERE tb_article.account_id = #{id} AND tb_article.article_id IN ( SELECT tb_article_super_article_id.article_id FROM tb_article_super_article_id WHERE tb_article_super_article_id.super_article_id = ( SELECT tb_super_article_sort.super_article_sort_id FROM tb_super_article_sort WHERE tb_super_article_sort.account_id = #{id} AND tb_super_article_sort.super_artilce_name = #{name} ) GROUP BY tb_article_super_article_id.article_id )
mapper.update:
update tb_super_article_sort
super_article_sort_id = #{record.superArticleSortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
super_artilce_name = #{record.superArtilceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_id = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_time = #{record.creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
to_update = #{record.toUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bei_yong_yi = #{record.beiYongYi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bei_yong_er = #{record.beiYongEr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bei_yong_san = #{record.beiYongSan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tb_super_article_sort set super_article_sort_id = #{record.superArticleSortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, super_artilce_name = #{record.superArtilceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{record.creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, to_update = #{record.toUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bei_yong_yi = #{record.beiYongYi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bei_yong_er = #{record.beiYongEr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bei_yong_san = #{record.beiYongSan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_super_article_sort
super_artilce_name = #{superArtilceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

bei_yong_yi = #{beiYongYi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

bei_yong_san = #{beiYongSan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where super_article_sort_id = #{superArticleSortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_super_article_sort set super_artilce_name = #{superArtilceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, to_update = #{toUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bei_yong_yi = #{beiYongYi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bei_yong_er = #{beiYongEr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bei_yong_san = #{beiYongSan,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where super_article_sort_id = #{superArticleSortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
